con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
log.info json.city.countryName
assert json.city.countryName.equals("UAE")
log.info json.city.areaPhoneCode assert json.city.areaPhoneCode.equals("654")

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
log.info json.country.id
assert json.country.id.equals(1)
log.info json.country.name
assert json.country.name.equals("UAE")

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
log.info json.destinationList def destinationList=json.destinationList.id log.info destinationList.getClass() def id=destinationList.find{ it==6 } log.info id assert id==6 log.info json.sectionHeader.sectionHeaderType assert json.sectionHeader.sectionHeaderType.equals("FEATURED_DESTINATION")

con:configuration.token: Home Page Featured Destination saved successfully.
Home Page general content saved successfully.
